name: Wushou Dance Costume: Roaring Suanni
description: Wushou Dance props made by Xiaqing specifically for "Just Wushou Dance!" They are filled with a special stone powder that can expand and take shape instantly during the game, allowing participants to use the skill "Bumper Wushou," while also taking great care to ensure the safety of the user.\nIt may be due to the festive atmosphere of Lantern Rite, but these dance costumes put people in a good mood, filling them with an eagerness to try and in the highest of spirits. Why not wear it and step onto the "Just Wushou Dance!" stage, and win yourself some sweet swag?
